scheme_name: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yozana
description: Mukhya Mantri Krishi Sa Sajuli Yojana, launched in 2018-19, promotes farm mechanization in Assam by providing financial assistance for modern farm tools to boost productivity.
key_features: Financial assistance of Rs. 5000 for farm tools
Focus on small and marginal farmers

criteria: Small and marginal farmers in Assam

special_notes: Aims to address low mechanization in Assam
